analyzed: de lta bu'i thal ba'i sbyor ba 'dis gdug pa can rnams rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba yang blta'o //
translated: One should see that by this application of ashes, the wicked are destroyed.

original: gdug pa can thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gdug pa can thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “All wicked ones” and so forth.

original: rab tu sbyor bas bsgrub pa'i thal ba des rnal 'byor ba'i lus la byugs nas khros te bltas pa tsam gyis drag po stong yang mgo 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab tu sbyor bas bsgrub pa'i thal ba des rnal 'byor ba'i lus la byugs nas khros te bltas pa tsam gyis drag po stong yang mgo 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the application of the ashes of the one to be accomplished, having anointed the body of the yogin, by merely looking with anger, even a thousand Rudras will have their heads split.

original: de bzhin du sems kyis byas pa tsam gyis smyo bar byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sems kyis byas pa tsam gyis smyo bar byed do //
translated: In the same way, by the mere act of the mind, one causes madness.

original: de bzhin du rab tu grub pa'i thal ba 'di nyid til mar bzang po dang bsres nas mig la byugs na dpag tshad stong na gnas pa'i dngos po rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rab tu grub pa'i thal ba 'di nyid til mar bzang po dang bsres nas mig la byugs na dpag tshad stong na gnas pa'i dngos po rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, by mixing this very ash of the one to be accomplished with good oil and anointing the eyes, even things situated a thousand leagues away will be seen.

original: de dngos po de rnams mthong bar gyur na rnal 'byor ba des sbom po dang tha ltag gis brdegs pa tsam gyis de dag rang nyid 'ongs nas gam du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dngos po de rnams mthong bar gyur na rnal 'byor ba des sbom po dang tha ltag gis brdegs pa tsam gyis de dag rang nyid 'ongs nas gam du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: When he sees those things, the yogin should strike them with the palm of his hand or the back of his hand. They will come to him and stand before him.

original: de bzhin du thal ba de nyid kyi rab tu sbyor ba gzhan yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du thal ba de nyid kyi rab tu sbyor ba gzhan yang gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, he also teaches another application of that ash.

original: thal ba de gi wang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thal ba de gi wang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: With the ash, one should apply collyrium, etc.

original: rnal 'byor bas rab tu sbyor ba 'di byas na 'dis ni dmag gi tshogs stong ngam 'bum yang khas bub tu 'gyel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bas rab tu sbyor ba 'di byas na 'dis ni dmag gi tshogs stong ngam 'bum yang khas bub tu 'gyel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the yogin performs this application, then with this he can cause an army of a thousand or a hundred thousand to fall face down.🔽By merely washing, etc.

original: bkrus pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i mthe bo de 'o mas bkrus bar byas na dgra bo rnams slar yang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bkrus pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i mthe bo de 'o mas bkrus bar byas na dgra bo rnams slar yang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the yogin washes his thumb with milk, then the enemies will revive.

original: gzhan yang thal ba'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis gzhan du sbyar ba las gsar du 'gyur bar blta ba yang thal ba de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang thal ba'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis gzhan du sbyar ba las gsar du 'gyur bar blta ba yang thal ba de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Also, one should see a new application of that ash application in another application, such as with that ash, etc.

original: shing bang ga'i khu ba zhes ni shing bang ga'i bcud do //
analyzed: shing bang ga'i khu ba zhes ni shing bang ga'i bcud do //
translated: The juice of the bhangā tree is the essence of the bhangā tree.

original: de nas rdo rje las byung bar gzhug go//
analyzed: de nas rdo rje las byung bar gzhug go//
translated: Then one should insert the vajra.

original: @166a * // lcags kan te zhes bya ba phye mar byas pa yang der blugs so //
analyzed: @166a * // lcags kan te zhes bya ba phye mar byas pa yang der blugs so //
translated: The iron kantaka is also put there, made into a powder.

original: rdo rje dbyug pa'i bcud ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyug pa'i bcud ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The essence of the vajra staff is Akṣobhya.

original: mkhris chen gyis bsnos nas zhes bya ba ni mi'i mkhris pas bsno ba'o //
analyzed: mkhris chen gyis bsnos nas zhes bya ba ni mi'i mkhris pas bsno ba'o //
translated: Having been moistened with great bile means having been moistened with human bile.

original: de nas gzhan yang gzhon nu ma'i rdo rje'i rtsis kyi don gyi rab tu sbyor ba gzhan dag gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang gzhon nu ma'i rdo rje'i rtsis kyi don gyi rab tu sbyor ba gzhan dag gsungs pa /
translated: Now, moreover, it is said that there are other applications of the meaning of the vajra verse of the young woman.

original: yang thal ba de nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: yang thal ba de nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: With that very ash, etc.

original: thal ba de spyi bor byin te rdo rje las byung bas kyang gzhon nu ma'i der rab tu brlan par bya'o //
analyzed: thal ba de spyi bor byin te rdo rje las byung bas kyang gzhon nu ma'i der rab tu brlan par bya'o //
translated: Having given that ash to the head, one should also moisten it with the young woman's vajra, arisen from the vajra.

original: gzhan yang thal ba de nyid kyis de la thig le yang bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang thal ba de nyid kyis de la thig le yang bya'o //
translated: Moreover, one should also make a bindu with that very ash on her.

original: de la bdug pa lngas bdugs na zhes bya ba ni gzhon nu ma de la bdud rtsi lnga'i bdug pas bdugs na'o //
analyzed: de la bdug pa lngas bdugs na zhes bya ba ni gzhon nu ma de la bdud rtsi lnga'i bdug pas bdugs na'o //
translated: Having fumigated her with the five incenses means having fumigated that young woman with the incense of the five nectars.

original: rab tu sbyor ba de lta bu las gzhon nu ma thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba de lta bu las gzhon nu ma thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By such an application, all the maidens will speak.

original: gzhon nu ma de lta bu'i de'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di byas nas /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma de lta bu'i de'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di byas nas /
translated: Having done such an application of that kind,

original: gzhan yang grub pa'i ral gri bdun po kha nas 'thon par 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba gzhan dag sbyar bar brjod pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang grub pa'i ral gri bdun po kha nas 'thon par 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba gzhan dag sbyar bar brjod pa /
translated: he should also apply the other applications that are said to be the production of the seven swords from the mouth.

original: don 'grub pa'i 'bras bu la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: don 'grub pa'i 'bras bu la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The result of accomplishing the aim, etc.

original: don 'grub pa'i 'bras bu ni yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: don 'grub pa'i 'bras bu ni yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'o //
translated: The result of accomplishing the aim is mustard seed.

original: rab tu sbyor ba 'dis rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub skyed par byed do //
analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba 'dis rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub skyed par byed do //
translated: By this application, it produces the power of a knowledge-holder.

original: gzhan yang thal ba de nyid kyis ri lu'i dngos grub bsgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang thal ba de nyid kyis ri lu'i dngos grub bsgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: Also, it is said that by that very ash, one should accomplish the power of the pill.

original: thal ba de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thal ba de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: By that ash, etc.

original: lcags gsum gyis dkris nas ri lur byas te zhes bya ba ni zangs ma dang / dngul dang / gser gyi thal ba de phur te rnal 'byor pas ri lu'i dngos grub grub par bya ba'i don du ri lur bya ba yin no //
analyzed: lcags gsum gyis dkris nas ri lur byas te zhes bya ba ni zangs ma dang / dngul dang / gser gyi thal ba de phur te rnal 'byor pas ri lu'i dngos grub grub par bya ba'i don du ri lur bya ba yin no //
translated: The phrase having wrapped it in the three metals, make it into a pill means that one should mix the ashes of copper, silver, and gold, and make it into a pill for the yogi to achieve the siddhi of the pill.

original: de bzhin du gzhan yang grub pa'i sngags bstan pa de yang ji lta ba bzhin yin pas khong du chud pa sla'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan yang grub pa'i sngags bstan pa de yang ji lta ba bzhin yin pas khong du chud pa sla'o //
translated: Similarly, the other taught mantras are also as they are, so they are easy to understand.

original: 'di dag ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po'i le'u gnyis 'grel pa /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po'i le'u gnyis 'grel pa /
translated: This is the commentary on chapter two of the king of tantras called the Buddhakapala, the unsurpassed yoga tantra of yoginis.

original: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po padma rdo rje zhes bya ba dngos grub chen po brnyes pas mdzad pa'o /
analyzed: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po padma rdo rje zhes bya ba dngos grub chen po brnyes pas mdzad pa'o /
translated: It was composed by the great scholar and master called Padmaraja, who attained great siddhis.

original: // / sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel de kho na nyid kyi zla ba zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po padma rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: // / sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel de kho na nyid kyi zla ba zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po padma rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The commentary on the Buddhakapala Tantra called Tathagatacandra, composed by the great scholar and master Padmaraja, is complete.
